member.summary: Creates a new administrator user account.

If the email is already registered
If the request is not authenticated

member.response: User is not authenticated or authorized

member.name: M:OnlineWallet.API.Controllers.AdminController.DeleteAdminAsync(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes an administrator user from the system
member.param: The unique identifier of the admin to delete
member.remarks:
Sample request:
DELETE /api/admin/12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc
Only users with Manager role can perform this operation.
member.response: User is not authenticated or lacks Manager role
Admin with specified ID is not found
